summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SocialFi Multi-Network Ingestion Platform. All 32 backend API tests passed. Frontend landing page loads correctly with wallet connect UI. All core features working as expected.
critical_code_review_comments: Leaderboard shows 'username' field but API returns 'wallet_address' - minor display inconsistency in Leaderboard.js line 159
Reddit and Farcaster connectors may return empty results due to API blocking - app correctly falls back to paste URL functionality
seed_data_creation: Sample posts already seeded in database (10 posts from reddit, farcaster, x networks)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs tested and working. Wallet authentication requires MetaMask browser extension which cannot be tested in automated environment. Feed has 10 sample posts with market data. Network filters (reddit, farcaster, x) and sort options (trending, new, price, volume) all working correctly.

categories: Feed API (12 tests - filters, sorting, pagination, market data)
Auth Required Endpoints (5 tests - buy, sell, portfolio, paste-url, auth/me)

frontend_tests.landing_page: All UI elements present and visible
frontend_tests.network_badges: All 5 networks displayed (Reddit, Farcaster, X, Instagram, Twitch)
frontend_tests.design: Clean dark theme with good contrast, proper spacing

notes.wallet_auth: Wallet signature flow requires real MetaMask which is not available in test environment. Backend auth endpoints tested for proper 401 responses.
notes.mocked_apis: Reddit and Farcaster connectors are implemented but may return empty due to API blocking. The app falls back to paste URL functionality.
